definitions.definition: a piece of hair that grows or has been formed into a curving shape, or something that is the same shape as this:
the curved shape in which a ball moves when it is hit or kicked in a particular way:
examples: The curl on the shot sent it looping around the keeper into the far corner of the net.

definitions.definition: to make something into the shape of a curl, or to grow or change into this shape:
examples: Does your hair curl naturally, or is it permed?

definitions.definition: to make a ball move in a curved shape by hitting or kicking it in a particular way:
examples: He curled the ball into the top right hand corner.

definitions.definition: to show by an upward movement of one side of your mouth that you feel no respect for something or someone:
examples: Her lip curled at what he said.
